name: OnVehiclePaintjob
notes:
This callback is not called by ChangeVehiclePaintjob.
 You might use OnVehicleChangePaintjob from vSync in order to know when the player buys the paintjob.
description: Called when a player previews a vehicle paintjob inside a mod shop. Watch out, this callback is not called when the player buys the paintjob.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that changed the paintjob of their vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle that had its paintjob changed.

params_body.name: paintjobid
params_body.description: The ID of the new paintjob.

return_values: It is always called first in gamemode so returning 0 there blocks other filterscripts from seeing it.
related_fn:
ChangeVehiclePaintjob: Change the paintjob on a vehicle.
 ChangeVehicleColor: Set the color of a vehicle.
 OnVehicleRespray: Called when a vehicle is resprayed.
 OnVehicleMod: Called when a vehicle is modded.
related_cb:
OnVehicleRespray: Called when a vehicle is resprayed.
 OnVehicleMod: Called when a vehicle is modded.
